vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in TokenBank.withdrawToHolder (patch_3.sol#58-63):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(addr.call.value(weiAmount)()) (patch_3.sol#60)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- holders (patch_3.sol#61)
